survey_properties.intro_message:
Your feedback helps us to build a better mobile product.


Hello, Feedback from our clients, friends and family is how we make key decisions on what the future holds for AKILIMO App.

By combining data and previous feedback we have introduced many new features.

It will take less than a minute to answer the feedback quiz.
survey_properties.end_message: Thank you for having the time to take our survey.

questions.question_title: How would you describe your use of the AKILIMO tool best?
choices: I'm a cassava grower using the app for my farm
I'm a farmer or community member using the app to assist a fellow farmer
I'm an extension worker or other service provider using the app to advise a farmer
